description:
At the apartment where Shukichi attends shogi study sessions, Genda Yasukiyo, one of the group`s members, is murdered. The home of former study group member Kishimoto Yuhei catches fire, and his body is found inside. Meanwhile, Shukichi seems to have noticed a clue to the culprit`s identity and is kidnapped. Conan meets up with Akai, and together they go to rescue Shukichi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 太閤名人の将棋盤 (王手編)
